website_summaries.verdict: A powerhouse steam cleaner that you can use on just about anything.
pros: Great for heavy-duty cleaning, and sanitizing
cons: On the more expensive side, but owners say it is well worth the investment

customer_reviews.title: Not hot enough not enough pressure i find it useless
customer_reviews.text: Did not clean anything how am I supposed to clean an oven with this, too useles, sending back for a refund i pay 138 something now its only 85 🤔 I put a video for you all
customer_reviews.author: Victor Santa Cruz

customer_reviews.title: underwhelming
customer_reviews.text: The steam comes out at about 140-160 degrees, at least according to a cooking thermometer placed right up to the outlet. Pressure was underwhelming. You really have to scrub with the brush to clean anything and yes, the steam does help lift dirt when you do that, but it's not a point-and-blast steam cleaner by any means. Using the provided microfiber mop head on a tile floor, I was unable to lift any stains compared to scrubbing manually, and the floor would be cool to the touch (and wet) immediately after passing over it. I would not call this "heavy duty" and don't really see a use for it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: This is tge third time I had this steamer replaced and each time it was the same problem! if a liitle bit of water gets down in the cracks while filling it up it was short circuit! and i even used the funnel that they provied EVERY TIME I FILLED IT but even a little resadue can still get through the cracks ! very frustrating
customer_reviews.author: EliYah Yisrael

customer_reviews.title: Cheap product
customer_reviews.text: The hose to this product broke after just three months and I'm past the eligible time to return the cleaner. The attachments are also useless.
customer_reviews.author: erin

customer_reviews.title: No results,but a lot of fuzz
customer_reviews.text: This machine didd not clean the shower glass,or the shower wall and floor tiles. I had scrubbed all before steaming. I steamed each area 5 times,with wiping,then using a scrub brush manually.then I continued steam cleaning ,and the tiles still did not feel clean. The grout did not look different,and the water spots and dullness remained. It was easy to assemble,but that is the only positive comment regarding this product. It is not worth time spent considering an ineffective outcome. Also, I did try several of the attachments,with none making a difference.
customer_reviews.author: genna

customer_reviews.title: Peice of junk
customer_reviews.text: Heavy Duty BS lies. Used the thing twice for maybe 30 minutes each time. On 3rd use, the steam comes out of the top instead of the bottom where you would expect it to. Cheaper to just call someone to clean than this overpriced garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Kris Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Bed bug kill
customer_reviews.text: I pointed a steady stream of steam towards the bed frame and bed bugs started falling down... Got it for bed bug eradication and it is working. Well made and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Radi

customer_reviews.title: At best, it had minimal cleaning effect on the fabric
customer_reviews.text: Forget this product for the purpose I purchased it - to steam clean my cloth upholstery in my Subaru. At best, it had minimal cleaning effect on the fabric, and at worst, actually made a few spots worse. Additionally - the instructions indicated that the product comes with two extensions that fit back to back. Only one was packed. Forget this.
customer_reviews.author: David Martin

customer_reviews.title: Repeat buyer
customer_reviews.text: Ok so this is our second buying this product. It works really well. However I’d like to say the the small brushes don’t last long and the replacement brushes are like $18. Which is expensive for just four brushes. I detail cars ( not very many, maybe 2 a week) I probably use it more than the average person. After a while the plastic on the hose unraveled and the spring and button at the top pops off. It’s really frustrating because it was awesome while it lasted which is why I bought it again, I’m hoping this one last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Naydana

customer_reviews.title: The best cleaning tool on the planet!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could give this more stars. We just bought a house with a ton of tile. The grout is pretty gross, and this thing destroys the gunk! I’m going to clean ALL THE THINGS!!! It’s easy to use- the only recommendation I have is to grab some earplugs because it’s kinda loud (but so worth it)!
customer_reviews.author: kmb07

customer_reviews.title: This thing works
customer_reviews.text: I bought this steamer after checking the reviews of other customers. I am extremely happy. We didn't have an extreme bed bug problem but we did have a problem and my wife is very allergic to most insect bites so I steamed my mattress, box spring, bed frame and as much of the rest of the room as possible. I received it several days earlier than expected and did the room within two days. Since then we have found only 1 bug. I also used it to steam my love seat and recliner because we have cats and occasionally have a flea problem. We haven't seen any fleas but I don't want to either. I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Is easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Pros: This is a powerful steamer. Holds a lot of water. Is easy to use. Rolls around nicely. Heats up quickly. Cons: No cord wrap or hose wrap so it's a mess to store. Locking button on the handle is difficult to lock into place but it does lock. Nylon brush heads can't stand up to the heat of the steam and curl/bend and become useless. Brass brush head is pretty good. Bought to try to clean tile grout. Will need to buy a replacement set of brass brush heads but they are 5 for $30! Recommendation to maker: Make a stronger brush head and include more brass ones. Design a cord wrap at least.
customer_reviews.author: Dallas Deb

customer_reviews.title: Disinfects and deodorizes just fine however, I bought to kill bed bugs and ...
customer_reviews.text: Disinfects and deodorizes just fine however, I bought to kill bed bugs and the steam stream just blows them away no matter what nozzle you use. If you can get the stream on the bug you must hold it on them for several minutes or it just stuns them and they come back to life.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth K.

customer_reviews.title: Cold “steam”
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t heat up as others mentioned. Got it for my car but could only soaked it. Bad experience. I ended up ordering a replacement but before I could give it a second chance I purchased from a different brad which I won’t mention. I don’t want to promote anyone. To the manufacturer, you seem to get it right on some of the units as you have some good reviews. Maybe get a better system for your quality control. Also, the water in the boiler(container) was still hot after sitting for at least 1hr outside. Something happening from the boiler to the hose/gun. Feel free to reach out.
customer_reviews.author: Rolassa

customer_reviews.title: ...and secretly, I love steaming the heck out of stuff now. I want to go around disinfecting everything!  buy it. You wont be di
customer_reviews.text: This thing is Awesome! Just the right amount of heavy duty along with functional. There's a TON of tips and add-ons for all types of cleaning. Just have to be careful you don't overdo it! My only issue is the tips/adaptors wear out extremely fast. I know they want me to reorder, but would be nice if they were made to last a bit longer. For this price I was really happy to get something of such great quality. I'm extremely satisfied with the product. ...and secretly, I love steaming the heck out of stuff now. I want to go around disinfecting everything! Cord and Hose length are more than adequate as well.. buy it. You wont be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Lead Singer

customer_reviews.title: Had no idea what to buy...
customer_reviews.text: Our ultra-clean house suddenly had bed bugs and we had no idea why. After hours and hours of sleepless research we purchased this steamer to help in our fight. This machine is awesome! Light, easy to use, versatile with all of the attachments. I had no knowledge of steamers other than garment steamers or steam cleaner vacuums with suction, etc... I hope this review can help other people that find themselves in a similar situation with suddenly seeing bed bugs and not understanding how they got them. Fortunately we are winning the war and this product has been a huge help!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If it worked.......
customer_reviews.text: As much as I love this steamer, the fact that it stopped working within a few months makes it worthless to me. I've been steaming for almost two decades as my primary method of cleaning, and have used a number of different brands. this would be close to the top of the list if it had continued to work. Even more disappointing, I called the manufacturer as it was still under warranty; they were pleasant and helpful; even had an easy solution to sending the defective machine back. Unfortunately, two months later, and I am still without a replacement steamer .
customer_reviews.author: Denise Halvorsen

customer_reviews.title: Really can't rate. Steamer did not work (wouldn't turn ...
customer_reviews.text: Really can't rate. Steamer did not work (wouldn't turn on or heat up). I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: scott donellan

customer_reviews.title: Great steamer with many attachment pieces
customer_reviews.text: Great steamer with many attachment pieces. Major CON is that the bristles wear out in one use. It's sad and can't even find replacement pieces....bummer
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Amazing steamer!
customer_reviews.text: Have owned for almost two years now. We use it regularly on tile floors and it does an amazing job! Compared to the Shark version we had before the steam just keeps coming and the handle is longer so you do not have to bend over as much! We have used it to clean the tile shower and grout as well with great results. Took it out to give the grill a cleaning and worked great there as well! Best steam cleaner we have owned and would give 10 stars if we could. One word to the wise do not over fill the tank; follow the directions on fill level.
customer_reviews.author: VictorM

customer_reviews.title: Cheap plastic materials for steam uses
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in April and I used for fewer than 15 times At first it was great it did the job it was supposed to do but in less than a year the handle lock broke When I opened to see what was wrong the whole lock parts were broken into pieces Cheap plastic material used
customer_reviews.author: Marcellinho

customer_reviews.title: Good quality steamer for the price
customer_reviews.text: I had ordered a different steamer which broker after the 2nd use. I returned it and then did some shopping around and found this one. I ordered it and am so glad I did! I mainly ordered for a bedbug problem we’ve been having. I steamed the living room furniture and carpeting which seemed to help the problem somewhat but realize that steaming alone will not get rid of bedbugs. My house smelled fresher as the steamer did help eliminate any odors in the furniture and carpeting. I have used it several times and still works as well as the first time!
customer_reviews.author: phillygirl

customer_reviews.title: Really works great, especially for cleaning grout which is the MAIN ...
customer_reviews.text: Really works great, especially for cleaning grout which is the MAIN purpose for which I purchased it. The nylon bristle brushes do get bent over pretty quickly, but the the shortened bristles actually work better in grout lines. Replacement bristles are hard to find, Amazon has another model of brushes that do NOT fit this steamer, AFAIK, but I did find replacement brushes on McCulloch's own website. The pad, no so great. It's such a large area for the steamer to handle, I don't think it's much better than a warm damp mop. The foam pad, I have not used much, but it does compress pretty easily, so I'm not sure if it'll be useful yet.
customer_reviews.author: John T.

customer_reviews.title: No suction
customer_reviews.text: One issue I have with the machine is that there is no suction. It does provide steam but without suction the results are not great. I've had to wipe my upholstery surfaces with a towel, and water and steam sink back into the fabric. Dirt and stains resurface if I so much as spill water on the uphokstery. I've tried cleaning grout on my bathroom floor with the machine and it does seem to loosen dirt, but not entirely. I still have to use a toothbrush to deep clean grout.
customer_reviews.author: Trixieann

customer_reviews.title: Amazing little machine
customer_reviews.text: This little machine does it, My husbands grill had caked on grease from a lot of grilling,I actually used the little abrasive attachment that is supposed to be to clean the inside of the grill on the thick caked on part just with gentle circles,then I switched back the the regular brush, this photo was only after one session I probably will blast one more time to get it real clean!
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: Excellent budget steamer. For home and automotive use
customer_reviews.text: Excellent steamer. Saved me products when I am steaming cars. Gets rids of stains quite easily. My favorite is the triangle brush with a cloth at the end of it. Makes detailing the interior of cars a much easier and fun job. Takes about 10 minutes to fully warm up. Spits out a stream of water 100% of the time if you have the steam going, but have not used it in 45+ seconds. This can be annoying because sometimes I will forget and hot-water blast something, when I only want steam. This is excellent value, and seems like a machine that will last for 2-5 years.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn P

customer_reviews.title: Kills bedbugs dead
customer_reviews.text: While it is not the only use for this steam cleaner, I bought this one specifically to help rid my apartment of a bedbug infestation. It comes with a variety of attachments, way more than I ever needed. Takes about 10 minutes (full tank) to go from cold to having usable steam pressure. If you use the more demanding attachments, it will have a little trouble supplying a 100% constant pressure supply. However pausing even a few seconds every few minutes allows it to catch up pretty quick. Tank can last 30-60 minutes of heavy steam use. Definitely a worthy investment, I'd definitely go with this one over any handheld version.
customer_reviews.author: C. Woody

customer_reviews.title: Purchased 2 times.  You last purchased this item on March 31, 2018.  View this order
customer_reviews.text: well I have bought 2...they don't last long. this last one lasted longest but I only use this once in awhile...not even once a month. I feel its a must have for cleaning but so expensive for how long it lasts....not sure about buying again...very very very frustrating. the headline is my amazon account history.
customer_reviews.author: Аmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quite a revelation for deep cleaning
customer_reviews.text: I had never thought that I'd needed one of these until I put my house up for sale, but I realized just how difficult it was to get tile and other surfaces looking brand new. This machine gets you there faster, with less hassle, and more reliably than any other manual solutions. The only reason I'm giving this a four star rating is because the brushes wear out too fast, but that actually is a function of the physical limits of the materials involved. McCulloch is not NASA and probably doesn't have the means to develop something indestructible for the kinds of jobs this machine is made for. Just buy more brushes the same day you order this bad boy.
customer_reviews.author: Mark A. Knowles

customer_reviews.title: You need a heavy duty steamer to get the job done
customer_reviews.text: I've had a small hand held steamer for many years and it finally gave up the ghost and I decided to upgrade to something stronger. the McCulloch fits the bill and does a much better job than the hand held ever did and the price is pretty reasonable too. Also with many attachments that were designed for steam cleaning in mind it makes using it a lot easier even than my hand held model.
customer_reviews.author: J. Allison

customer_reviews.title: Love it !
customer_reviews.text: Bought it primarily for cleaning shower stalls and does it ever. The build up just melts off the walls, floor. The shower is fiberglass and it is not to hot to effect the fiberglass. I like the size of reservoir as it gives me a good 40 plus minutes of use with a continuous steam. Also, cleans grout well and tile. Have clean threshold of window casings that are powder coated. It to works well for this application. I only use distilled water in it as I don't want to have mineral build up in the reservoir and affect it's heating of water.
customer_reviews.author: Mike M

customer_reviews.title: Great value, works very well
customer_reviews.text: I get obsessive from time to time about cleaning. I absolutely love this steam cleaner. It is very nicely designed, it looks like a vintage Bugatti! It has a nice long hose and cord and two extension poles for long reaches. The wheels are larger and it rolls easily on deep carpet. Day one I cleaned a den, small bath, bedroom including windows, window tracks and an outside fiberglass door. It was easy and everything smelled better afterward and obviously no lingering cleanser odor which I hate. I think I got a steamer that had been returned, I did not get the measuring cup or funnel.
customer_reviews.author: Pelicanbrief

customer_reviews.title: Dissappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product because of the great reviews on it. I have owned it now for 2 months and have used it a handful of times and it's a great machine however I must of received a defective one. I use it mostly to clean my floor and bathroom but the last two times I noticed that the handle becomes extremely hot to even hold it and there is steam coming out of it. It is also leaking a lot of water from under the machine leaving puddles everywhere. Apparently the return period is over and I am stuck with this defective machine. I wish they would offer some kind of warranty on it so buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Johanna Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: love it no regrets
customer_reviews.text: my wife and I wanted a steam cleaner for a while because of its way to sanitize without chemicals. Im very happy I purchased this we almost don't put it away because we use it all the time! you can clean many many things with it we use it mainly for: cleaning baby toys(we purchased used from other parents), showers and floors, window ceals and blinds. the steam last a long time it is crazy how far 1 cup of water will go. if your considering getting one get this one its a great overall cleaner it can range from light to heavy duty cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: J. L. Redmon

customer_reviews.title: Great for a short time.
customer_reviews.text: I do really love this cleaner. The issue I had was that the attachments fell apart so quick. Not only that but the whole tube that covers the water line came apart from the handle. It says there is a 2yr warranty, but contacting and dealing with the company is a whole other issue. Not sure it’s even work having it replaced. UPDATE: I contacted the company directly and they were very helpful with sending me a new unit for free due to my circumstances. Be aware that warranty is VERY limited and does not cover any attachments. I’m happy overall with how they handled the situation.
customer_reviews.author: Ananda Willett

customer_reviews.title: DEEPLY SATISFIED
customer_reviews.text: This is AMAZING, my father had one similar many many years ago and I am glad to have found a wonderful replacement. This cleaned the grout on my floors with little to no effort and the constant steam flow lasted for a good time before I had to refill. The only downfall is you can lose momenteum while you are waiting for it to cool off to add more water if you have doing a bigger job. When I first got this I used it to clean everything I could think off, kitchen cabinets, crevices of the oven, grout in my kitchen and laundry room, to corners of every wall in my house. This is nothing short of amazing!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ms. DeVa

customer_reviews.title: It is a blessing for a person who is clean freak.
customer_reviews.text: I am so excited that I am writing the review after 1 day of receiving it. Guys I have gone crazy. I cleaned EVERYTHING IN MY HOUSE. I pay over 100 dollars every other week to cleaners bit trust me this is the best clean my house has ever been. I cleaned doors, knobs, toilets, counters, carpet stains, wall stains, crayons marks on walls, sofa, sanitized mattress, wood and marble floor, cabinets, bathroom mirrors in JUST 1 DAY! I am so tired now but very very happy. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amninder K.

customer_reviews.title: Will still need to scrub when using it
customer_reviews.text: Read all the 1 stars and I was worried seeing the person who got 3rd degree burns and that this unit plastic broke easy. I bought it after seeing all the cleaned surfaces and seeing some YouTube reviews. Now, my shower is gross I know. I'm lazy and I bought this hoping to make it easier to clean so I'm not in there scrubbing. While this did loosen lots of the grime it didn't perform to my expectations. I would say buy it knowing that you are still going to need to scrub and there a chance it will explode and/or break.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy

customer_reviews.title: For every minute of cleaning, add two minutes of reheating time...
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to receive this, but it didn’t meet my expectations. When it’s heated, it puts out a good amount of hot steam and works quite well. The problem is that the steam output is very hot for about a minute before it weakens and has to reheat for a few minutes. Cleaning ends up taking forever! I find it much faster just to clean using cleaning products and a scrub brush and also have the bonus of not looking like a drowned rat when I’m done. The handle also gets very hot while in use. If I hadn’t missed the return window, I would be packing it up and sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: Duncan Brown

customer_reviews.title: ability to clean
customer_reviews.text: It puts out a generous amount of steam. If your hair looks good, be sure to wear a shower cap when using.The floor cleaning attachment is different from the one on the demo. Have a hard time keeping the pad attached. There is no method to attach except the teeth on the plastic head. It would be helpful if you could empty the tank when finished from the bottom as It was heavy for me to turn it over to drain.
customer_reviews.author: GM H.

customer_reviews.title: A good buy
customer_reviews.text: Amazing results for less money by far than a service, and much cheaper overall than renting. I've only used this on my kitchen, which is all tiles, so far. I found that the nylon head for cleaning grout wears out rather quickly, but nothing else has worked on my difficult to clean floors and counters. And no chemicals - what a plus! I've attached some photos I took of the floor and counter during the process - the clean grout should be very obvious compared to the non-steamed grout. I had vigorously mopped the floor and cleaned the counter prior to steaming and didn't get anywhere near the desired results until I tried steam.
customer_reviews.author: Jo E. Meyertons

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Kind of a POS for the money I spent, it's quite a contraption as well. Tons of parts the hose tangles the cord has nowhere to be put away neatly. It does what it should but the nozzle brushes are unusable after one use. I bought it to clean grout and it's just as strenuous to use this as it is the scrub by hand with a grout brush and baking soda. Super disappointed, was hoping to use this for work on grout and deep cleaning jobs but I can't see myself lugging this octopus-like machine around when it's not even that much more efficient. I will probably just keep it for personal use in my own home.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Richards

customer_reviews.title: Powerful Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and powerful cleaning tool. I had hoped to use it on my bamboo floors but was advised by McCullough that it could remove the finish. I did use it on my bamboo cabinet just above my stove. It had accumulated some grease build-up. I had to use it a couple of times before the grease came off. Used it my tile floors with success. Great buy for the money. The reviews for other machines weren't as good . Better to send a little more to make sure it does the job and last longer. Recommend it to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia N

customer_reviews.title: Good product but could have been designed way better.
customer_reviews.text: Product is ok and disappointed after reading the reviews. Pros Get steam power Fairly good reach from the electrical outlet. Plenty of attachments Easy to assemble Cons Poor design From a user perspective telling me that the group that designed did not know much about cleaning their house. A poor handle to carry on handheld mode (a shoulder strap Would have been nice). The steam tube cannot Be shortened for hand held functional which feels like you are carrying a small vacuum all around. It is a back breaker vs stand up steamers So overall at the exception of the steam power. I was very disappointed with the design and functionality of the product.
customer_reviews.author: JCB

customer_reviews.title: I love this steam cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I love this steam cleaner. Seriously love. I have used it on windows. It gets the hard to get off grime from our black stove and it looks spotless. I’ve cleaned upholstery and it’s great. Today I cleaned the freezer where some sticky juice spilled and it came right off and looks great. My only complaint is the scrubbing attachments wear out quickly.
customer_reviews.author: ECD

customer_reviews.title: Dont bother
customer_reviews.text: Parts are falling off, very awkward to move around. Water builds up in the house and pours all over the floors. Before use you have to use a very absorbent towel to clean up, or the pads will be too wet to use. Dont recommend, the hassel is not worth the price paid. Also, the steam does not penetrate the pad unless you left the head of the cleaner. Honestly, I felt my cheap Shark did a more thorough job.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda B.

customer_reviews.title: This is a great brand but not in this model
customer_reviews.text: This is a good steamer however there are a few issues with this particular model 41 there are no handles to push pull or drag the steamer along with you while you clean and the compartment to hold the accessories is very flimsy the top comes off easily and it doesn't seem to click in place and not all the brushes fit inside of it and last the trigger handle gets extremely hot after just a few minutes of use I would buy this brand again but not necessarily this model
customer_reviews.author: Linda Reyna

customer_reviews.title: So far so good! except one issue...
customer_reviews.text: Did well on tile When followed by a microfiber cloth it worked well on one of my couches so far. Worked well for clothing and my window curtains. worked well on baseboards. i will be attempting some carpet stains (about 2 weeks old - my old steamer cord was eaten by new puppy) from the dogs sometime soon along with my car seats. so far very pleased with it EXCEPT their should be a CAUTION for how hot the handle gets. i advise wearing gloves or heat protective hand gear if you plan to use the machine more than 15mins. the handle gets HOT!!! like you wont want to be using this more than 30mins at a time. seriously.
customer_reviews.author: Hailey Harbuck

customer_reviews.title: Does not get hot enough at all
customer_reviews.text: After reading all the reviews, I decided to give this a try. But, as some reviewers noted, this is nowhere hot enough to steam anything properly for cleaning purposes. The steam hardly got hot enough holding it against my hand. I got more heat out of my hair dryer holding it for 10-15 seconds against the mattress I attempting to clean.
customer_reviews.author: ctech99

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, I like not having to use chemicals. Feel like it gets my ceramic floors clean, but unfortunately does not keep the grout clean. I assume it's because most grout is recessed and the pad doesn't reach into these grooves. Scrubbing the grout with a stiff brush initially and nozzle steaming it on my hands and knees did work, but I was hoping doing the simple mopping with the steam cleaner every week would KEEP the grout clean. It does not. Amazes me that people use this on wood floors, steam cleaners are NOT for wood floors or laminate floors!
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing
customer_reviews.text: I got this primarily for auto detailing, but I've found it's equally as useful around the house. Heat up time is true to what the manufacturer says. I was able to mop my kitchen floor, bathroom floor, sanitize counters in both rooms, clean toilet, sanitize dozens of toys and clean bathtub in under one tank. For autos it does a good job of blasting grease and grime that is typically found in cupholders. Combined with other products it got rid of 90 percent of gum that was embedded in a car seat for years. Long hose is handy in the car to reach around the whole interior.
customer_reviews.author: Dumac

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for detailing cars.
customer_reviews.text: Five star out of five star works amazing takes about 10 to 15 minutes to heat up and then you can start using it are use it for detailing cars and getting inside the cracks of the door panels and the AC vents also works great for taking stains out of carpet‘s and also cleaning leather seats just make sure you wrap a microfiber cloth around it before you steam leather seats so you want burn the seat.
customer_reviews.author: Izec Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: I've even used it to steam clean my beige carpet and was pretty satisfied with the results
customer_reviews.text: I have had this steamer over 6 months. A contractor used it to remove wall paper off the wall of two rooms. He found it to be effective in removing the old wall paper after putting some type of solution on the walls. I use it to steam clean window ledges, baseboards, cracks between floorboards, and more. I've even used it to steam clean my beige carpet and was pretty satisfied with the results. I'd like the product to offer varied steam settings and one with just a little bit more steam power. Overall for the price, ease of use and the many purposes I have used it for, it's a pretty good product at a pretty good price.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: I recommend to buy!
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this steamer is insanely good. It does its job. I am a mobile detailer and this saves me bunch of time! The tank lasts me a whole freaken car and it is pretty powerful. I use ONLY distilled water and the cord is really long. The only bad things about this steamer so far that i've experienced: - At first IT WILL SQUIRT HOT WATER OUT!!! I've got caught off-gaurd once or twice and it is burning hot! - There is a light there but i dont know when it is ready to use or not. Maybe i am unable to see the light in the daytime..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cleans well break easily
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't recommend this unit. It's made from cheat material. In less than a year it has already stop working and the manufacturer refuses to honor the warranty. Granted I used it for my business but one of my client had one for his home and it broke in a matter of months also. He warned me the first day he saw it that it would break and the manufacturer will not replace it. And true to his word that's exactly what happen.
customer_reviews.author: Willie Blair

customer_reviews.title: Little muscle machine.
customer_reviews.text: Love this little machine. We had guess who stayed in my sons room and when they left my son stated he was getting bit. We thought mosquitoes got him while outside. Then he broke out in hives like bumps. Saw a bug and there it was, darn bed bugs. Tried every thing for 2 weeks and baby bugs and a few larger bugs. Saw this item,read reviews and went for it. See ya later nasty bugs. Gone. Now going to use for window and seal washing.
customer_reviews.author: Mia McDaniels

customer_reviews.title: Good for a small unit
customer_reviews.text: This steam cleaner works well for its size. Be sure you’re intentions are realistic with this unit. The whole issue that I read about regarding pressure issues exists when you use it for longer than maybe 40 seconds at a time. I think it will be good for small projects, but anything large maybe frustrating because it needs time to build up pressure.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this machine
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about buying this steam machine but now that I've had it a while and have used it throughout my place, I'm wondering how every home doesn't have one and how did I deep clean without it for so long? It's great on floors, to deep clean tiles, and showers. It will steam curtains (for wrinkles, not cleaning) or bedspreads. This machine is indispensable. Did I mention how well made it is? (Now I sound like I'm working for them). Seriously, I love this machine.
customer_reviews.author: Corinne

customer_reviews.title: Godsend for cleaning and paranoid post-exterminator bed bug hosts
customer_reviews.text: I bought these after my exterminator was done cleaning my apartment for bedbugs because I'm paranoid, but it cleans everything so nicely as well.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: Green tree gunk on windows..gone! Pet smell ..gone!
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this to steam the couch in hope to get the pet odor out, it worked. But I live on lots of acreage and this green stuff has coated everything. I mean everything. My window are always horrible, windex is no help. I pressure washed my house and it didnt come off, maybe about an hour long and more elbow grease it could have, but who has time for that? So after the couch, I thought well I'll give it a shot. It took me longer to find the extension cord to get it outside than it did to get the green off the windows. Even my husband was impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon has no business in politics

customer_reviews.title: Reviews are correct.
customer_reviews.text: Has everything needed for cleaning tasks. Easy to move and use. Needed for a beauty salon. Update May 27, the steamer will kill virus due to the high temperature, do have to make sure not to get too close to surfaces like plastic. Update July15 2020: kept using steamer a a beauty salon1800sf, using a wet microfiber towel with antiviral solution I go over seats, counter, doors, and everything around it takes 25 minutes or less, no chemicals involved, once finished I unplug the steamer I let the remain pressure off. Will add video soon.
customer_reviews.author: Rocky D Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: I have a cleaning business and used this for my last move out clean. It really helped with the bathroom and oven. Without it I would have had to spend many more hours scrubbing by hand. Just be mindful when adding more water. Wait till it’s completely empty (you’ll know cause it’ll stop spraying water) and then open up the top. If you open it up when it’s still hot and full of water, you can get burned by the steam. Only thing I really didn’t care for was the cord. I have no way of winding it up when I’m done. It’s just a big cord mess.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan VR

customer_reviews.title: I like it but dont love it.  Defenitly does not stay on for 45 mins
customer_reviews.text: It takes about 10 minutes to heat up and it claims you get 45 minutes of steam with a full water and that is absolutely not true. Lucky to get 15 minutes at high pressure. I do like that it dries quickly but would take several fills to do just my small sectional couch. Then you have to wait until it cools to refill the water, so it is time consuming. Also difficult to store. I wish the hose was detachable. It did come with a lot of nice tools and I do recommend it, just wish it had some better features and longer steam time.
customer_reviews.author: Foxy

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Cheap Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Let me just say that I love the idea of this machine but I also must say that the hose on this machine feels real cheap. I will be sending it back after using it last night to clean. It did an ok job but I can see this thing wont last more than a year before having to replace the hose or the machine. Does anyone have any recommendations under 500 bucks? I'm listening.
customer_reviews.author: REEEEZZO

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for 3 months. Then only hot air would come out, no moisture or steam. I only used distilled water. I tried cleaning with vinegar as stated in the manual. No luck. When it was working it was great. Didn't last long. Wouldn't recommend. Update mcculloch sent me a new unit with no hassles so there is a plus for customer service. But this thing is junk. Follow instructions precisely, use only distilled water, it heats up then shoots a stream of hot water and then nothing but hot air. What a waste of money
customer_reviews.author: AZ_BOY

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Machine!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this machine!!! I bought it mainly for when I detail cars. I detailed the entire interior of a Mazda 5 using nothing but H2O. No chemicals. This cleaned all those cracks and crevices beautifully. And you can use it on your entire house! I can't wait to do a deep Spring cleaning with this machine. So glad I got it!
customer_reviews.author: Annie Oak Tree

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic steam cleaner!
customer_reviews.text: Such a a cool steamer! It heats up quick and with all of the attachments you can really clean anything! It’s a must have if you’re worried about bedbugs! My son was in a college dorm that was notorious for bedbugs and I was able to steam all of his stuff before it came in the house! It’s a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie D.

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with some items missing.
customer_reviews.text: Mine arrived without the measuring cup, no funnel nor microfiber pads. I’ve only tried it twice. The steam comes out as it should. No leaks. It doesn’t clean the way it shows on the video. Doesn’t remove Calcium buildup on fixtures and tiles. It works good enough for steaming fabric. It does drip water from the nozzle when starting to use.
customer_reviews.author: Andy B.

customer_reviews.title: And I do like how the machine operates
customer_reviews.text: The plastic on this machine is just too cheap. The handle had to be replaced in one month; the hose is coming apart after 3 or 4 uses so I have to buy a new hose every couple months. And now after maybe 10-12 uses it won't turn on or heat up. It's low quality; really needs to improve before selling more -- or risk impugning reputation, because no one will accept a machine that has to be constantly repaired and lasts such a short time. And I do like how the machine operates, but "sturdy" it is NOT... it needs to be better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Steam cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Thought it would be a miracle cleaner but it isn’t. Was hoping it would clean all the mold off in my shower doors, it mainly loosens the dirt and makes it easier to clean. I love it as it makes cleaning easier. Have to wait about 20-30 for water to heat. Would be better with a gauge to see how much water, have to wait again to cool & refill because you have no idea what is left in tank. Bathrooms & kitchen sinks look nice. Don’t have to use the chemicals to clean with but does make cleaning a lot longer but happy with the job it does.
customer_reviews.author: Heather B.

customer_reviews.title: Oh yah!! This rocks!
customer_reviews.text: After buying a new home that needed some deep cleaning I decided to give this a try. It has a learning curve and still requires the use of elbow grease, but man does it clean! I’ve used it in the oven (worked ok) to the bathroom tiles (AMAZING) and keeping looking around for other things to use it on. It also got some dark scuff marks off the old linoleum in the kitchen fairly easily and just that was enough to sell me on it. Turn your heater down and thrown on shorts and a tank though-the combined heat of hard work and the steam from the machine replicates hot yoga.
customer_reviews.author: wad

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing. Steam, plenty. Cleaning, meh.
customer_reviews.text: This is pretty straight forward to use. Fill the tank, turn it on, steam available after it heats up. I'm not sold on its ability to deep clean things, however. I tried on a few areas, kitchen, one chair, the bathroom. Meh. A good chemical works far better, and with less hassle. That said, I have no problems with the basic design and build quality. If you need steam for your application, this could be a good tool.
customer_reviews.author: Hacksaw

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described. Love this. So easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and does what it says. My tiles and grout look wonderful! I cleaned anything that didn’t move and have no complaints at all. The only thing I’d say was dissapointing is that you get x2 floor pads and a bunch of little brushes etc but just one little green scrubber (X2 little scrubbers would have been perfect!) Otherwise I love this. It's also small enough to store away in a Corner.
customer_reviews.author: NAD

customer_reviews.title: There isn't a single thing I can't clean that needs Cleaning in my home!
customer_reviews.text: I have three, yes three top brands that I will not mention here. They all ran between a hundred fifty dollars to three hundred and ninety dollars, and this MCculloch works far much better, has more attachments and does more for FAR LESS Cost. I really Appreciate that!! I would definitely buy another, even if I only used it for outside! They work great and I would recommend it to anyone looking for a steamer!
customer_reviews.author: Rock Androl

customer_reviews.title: Great cleaning aid
customer_reviews.text: I have used this in my bathroom, on mfg wood floors and to clean tile floors and grout. The nozzle does get pretty warm so be aware. Also had to order new metal brush as the one that came with the unit worn out after not a lot of use on grout. Easy to use, not that heavy even full of water and last a long time on one refill
customer_reviews.author: Susan S.

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY FOR BEDBUGS
customer_reviews.text: Got the steamer for bedbugs. Spent over an hour reading the instructions and assembling. Let the unit sit for longer than instructed in the manual! The steamer did let off hot steam! I could put my hand in front of the stream, it was warm at best. The light on the unit would come back on after maybe 3 minutes of use, meaning it needed to heat up again. After letting the unit heat up the steam still would not get hot. Such a waste of time, money and hope.
customer_reviews.author: Song Peters

customer_reviews.title: Amazing... I can't stop cleaning!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this on a whim in an effort to clean without chemicals... you've created a monster... I cleaned my couches, blinds, headboard, kitchen cabinets, stove... it has yet to be put away because I simply keep finding things to clean!
customer_reviews.author: NM

customer_reviews.title: What a difference it makes
customer_reviews.text: We have hard water, little boys, pets and I can't clean like I use to (joints & health issues) it was getting me pretty down, and then I used this. So easy and quick. Bathrooms, oven, refrigerator, walls, cabinets and floors is what I've used it for so far. I've ruined walls and floors trying using chemicals to clean spots. Wish I had this sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 3 boys

customer_reviews.title: I really like it but
customer_reviews.text: I love this steamer, it's big enough to do a lot of things without having to stop and refill. Also because it steams to around 200 degrees. My only problem with it is that it keeps tripping my surge protector and it has no place to put your larger accessories. . I used this on my couches, chairs, etc. for the purpose of killing bedbugs. I use the floor attachment on the mattress and I use the squeegee attachment on the chairs. I recommend this . It's powerful.
customer_reviews.author: pixie nolin

customer_reviews.title: Didn't get out rug stains and not as powerful as I hoped
customer_reviews.text: Nice steam cleaners with a lot of capacity. Just not as effective as I hoped on rug stains.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. S

customer_reviews.title: Not functioning properly
customer_reviews.text: To start, this thing is put together with cheap wobbly plastic. The device would properly heat the water but would sputter out a mix of water and air inconsistently. I was shooting my own hand with it and it was hardly warm. Followed all directions and this product just didn't perform. Could have gotten a faulty one but too much of a headache as it is. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Rameil

customer_reviews.title: I HATE to clean
customer_reviews.text: I HATE to clean. I was originally looking for a steam mop. Considering the price of the mop alone, I thought I'd go for a steam cleaner that could do more. I never thought I would lose track of time cleaning because I was having a good time. I've been cleaning all my baseboards and mopping the floors. And you know that layer of grime that covers the bathroom counter where you use your hairspray? Does a great job melting it away. Looking forward to using the grill cleaner. I gave it 4 stars because the little brush attachments that come with it seem to start wearing down fairly quick. Definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Frederick

customer_reviews.title: Did not even last a year.
customer_reviews.text: When the steamer was purchased it worked great, a few months in the piece under the cap fell off (it still worked), then the steamer started making crazy noises like it was going to blow up, now it gets hot but no steam comes out. This was a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Advocates for Children

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy - Take time to read instructions.
customer_reviews.text: Good use for a weekly thorough cleaning, including glass, mirror, hardwood floor, and tiles. It is not magic but will deliver cleaner and chemical-free smell when cleaning your house. Great buy. But of course, I expected it to be magic so I only give it 4 stars. Make sure to read the instruction so you don't get accidental burn especially if you carelessly using the product.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Lazarevic

customer_reviews.title: Love this have bought 2 now.
customer_reviews.text: Neighbors who lived below us had Bed Bugs. This helped us keep those bugs kill and aways. Deep cleans everything I use on the mattress as well. cleans floors and refreshes carpet. This was a Bless. Light weight too.
customer_reviews.author: P.J.

customer_reviews.title: HANDY DANDY STEAMER
customer_reviews.text: For small jobs this seems to be the solution, upholstery and spots on carpet. Used to completely remove mystery stains from car carpeting that had been there many many years. Had defied hot water and the usual killer cleaners. I has a fair head of steam but not enough for heavy grease and road grime accumulations. Hose is plenty long enough so you don' have to drag the thing around. Several nozzles for way more uses than I'll probably use. Floor attachments are there too. One filling lasts about 20 minutes as I recall.
customer_reviews.author: DavE

customer_reviews.title: Easy to fill
customer_reviews.text: Very good flow for the price! More usable than the handhelds i have had in the past. Steam disinfects with not much water drip. Yea handle gets warm after a about 20 minutes but not so bad i need to stop at all. It comes with a funnel and is easy to fill. Well built parts and attachments. I would recommend to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Larry R

customer_reviews.title: JUNK JUNK JUNK
customer_reviews.text: Bought this pos 2 years ago used it once seem to work ok put away went to use again not hot steam cold water did have a 2 year warranty contacted amazon they cant do anything about there 30 is up not there problem need to contact the company directly they give me the run around funny this is they dont even have this peace of junk on there web site DONT BUY DONT BUY
customer_reviews.author: Jose Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: CRAP
customer_reviews.text: In theory this product seems like the perfect solution for cleaning without chemicals. Heat and pressurized steam with scrubbing power? Wow! ABSOLUTELY NOT! I'm convinced that the positive reviews are fakes because this thing DOES NOT WORK! I even thought about keeping it to steam furniture but it doesn't even work for that. Sooooooooo DISAPPOINTING
customer_reviews.author: D Balcom

customer_reviews.title: Poor attachments
customer_reviews.text: Great potential...heats quickly, and cleans deep! Grout/wood floors 👍🏻 Downside was attachments: green scrub bush broke first time using, and other brushes were only good for 1-2 uses. I found Not compatible with most furniture/rugs
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is much better than the hand held product I was replacing
customer_reviews.text: Keep in mind that when you put the nozzle down that there is still steam in the hose and it will drain on the floor if you don't elevate the hose above the canister, This is much better than the hand held product I was replacing , Both have hoses which are stiff but become more flexible as they warm up......at little frustrating beginning. Buy another set of brushes as they are nylon and will decompose under the heat they are subject to
customer_reviews.author: nathaniel swan

customer_reviews.title: Very useful for Bedbugs
customer_reviews.text: I have used this in three different houses for bed bugs and have been very successful eradicating the bedbug problems. It is much cheaper than renting industrial heaters to heat the house. Unless you have a huge infestation where they are throughout the house... using this steamer is excellent. You must steam all areas and crevices of mattresses, headboards, frame, furniture in room, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Easy fast to use, put together! Overall 20 minute set up time. Install attachments and adding water.
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy steaming my house especially with the virus going on and being able to steam anything at the comfort of my own home. Simple to use, simple to put together so far I LOVE IT!!! The only thing I noticed when it’s first started it was leaking along of water! Even while steaming it still dripped water. you add you have to wait till it heats up before starting what ever projects you want to accomplish. Takes about 10 minutes for a full cycle or Depending on how much water.Over all a great thing to buy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Adriana Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: Unhappy with my purchase... It didn’t work at all!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve got this cleaner but even after MANY tries I can’t get the product to work properly.... I would like to know if the product is defective or I was unlucky about my order.... (Temperature not hot most of the time and water jets coming out from the product even after waiting the necessary time for heating)... My latest try was on my mattress and the result was.... MATRESS COMPLETELY WET DUE COLD WATER JETS.... Please I’ve would like to know if there is solution other than just be unhappy with the product I’ve bought or purchase another brand and accept that I isn’t made a good choice about buying this product...
customer_reviews.author: Little Mike Fun

customer_reviews.title: Seven years of a haunting stain gone in 5 minutes.
customer_reviews.text: I love the McCulloch Steam Cleaner. I have used it on my cars and some grout and it's amazing. But what was truly amazing is the it was able to remove a stain my daughter made when she broke a bottle of nail polish on my tile floor. The stain was about 7 years old and I was too scared to use nail polish remover on it so its haunted me for seven years. Today I had the steam cleaner out and decided to try it in 5 minutes the 7 year haunt was over. I do strongly recomend the machine.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Nicklaus

customer_reviews.title: Excellent 💯
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, I am SUPER pleased with this purchase. Had a dust mite issue in our mattress and after we steamed it, no more problem! All the attachments mean we can use this steamer in a number of scenarios. I am so happy! I endorse this product 100 percent!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it, love it, love it. I just cleaned a stove that was covered on old grease. Let the steam do the work before scrubbing. You don't have to squash the brush attachments so hard as I have seen in the other reviews. Be careful it is steam and will burn you, when you start or after a pause and you start again you will get some hot water, but not much, aim it into a towel catch it. Do not open the water reservoir when its hot and under pressure.
customer_reviews.author: james w boyd

customer_reviews.title: Crazy good cleaner
customer_reviews.text: This steam cleaner is awesome! My 10 year old daughter mopped the floor with it, my 12 year old cleaned the banister with it, then I cleaned the walls and the windows. Its like I love in a new house. I especially like the heavy-dutyness, commercial-gradiness of it wrapped in house whole durable plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Rudolph

customer_reviews.title: Very cheap and flimsy!
customer_reviews.text: This product is very poorly built. Plastic is flimsy, brushes are not good and they wore out after 1 use cleaning Oven racks and item stopped producing steam after continuous use for 20 minutes. I would look at Dupray steam cleaning products. Highly recommend those over this cheap item. Spend your money elsewhere. This was a headache.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. I love steam cleaners but they always break ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I love steam cleaners but they always break down & I go for a few months without one and then I break down and buy a new one. This time I'm being ultra careful to use distilled water and not overuse at any one time. The steam pressure is decent and the steam gun can be locked so that I don't have to press down each time to release steam. I'm keeping my fingers crossed, but so far this seems like a good product.
customer_reviews.author: cocopuff

product_meta.title: McCulloch MC1275 Heavy-Duty Steam Cleaner with 18 Accessories, Extra-Long Power Cord, Chemical-Free Pressurized Cleaning for Most Floors, Counters, Appliances, Windows, Autos, and More
product_meta.description:
Providing 1500 watts of steam power, the MC1275 Heavy-Duty Steam Cleaner requires no chemicals and is easy to use. Ideal for cleaning and detailing cars, trucks, motorcycles, or boats, the cleaner removes grease and grime from engines, wheels, and chrome accessories. It also works well for removing stuck-on dirt from the BBQ grill, patio furniture, or garage. Steam kills 99.9% of germs and bacteria. The "steam ready" light indicates when the unit is ready to use, and a steam-control switch provides control over the amount of steam coming from the unit. The cleaner features a storage compartment for many of its 18 attachments. Its 15-foot power cord, caster wheels, and included accessories offer convenient mobility and make it easy to clean nooks and crannies in hard-to-reach places. The steam cleaner has a 48-ounce water tank capacity, which allows for up to 45 minutes of use.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
IMPORTANT INTERNATIONAL DISCLAIMER: This item is built to meet U.S. voltage requirements and may not function properly when used in conjunction with external devices that alter or convert voltage or frequency of electricity. Improper use or shipping the product outside the U.S. will void all warranties.
feature_bullets: SATISFACTION GUARANTEED — Backed by a 2-year hassle-free warranty and supported by a customer service team based in Andover, KS

CHEMICAL-FREE CLEANING — Naturally deep clean and sanitize without the use of harsh chemicals using hot, pressured steam to eliminate grease, grime, stains, and mold from a wide range of surfaces including ceramic tile, grout, granite, sealed wood flooring, laminate, appliances, grills, autos, and more

LARGE CAPACITY TANK — The 48-ounce water tank heats up in under 8 minutes and provides up to 45 minutes of steam with optional lockable steam trigger for continuous steam cleaning. Water Fill Method- Measuring Cup (16 oz).Steam Pressure- 43 psi
18 VERSATILE ACCESSORIES — Equipped for steam cleaning jobs in and around your home including a floor mop, mop pads, nylon brushes, brass brush, scrub pad, squeegee, and more
SUPERIOR REACH — An extra-long 15.7-foot power cord and over 9-foot steam hose provide added maneuverability and reach for those hard to get to places. Steam Rate- 33-37 g/min. Steam Pressure- 43 psi
Built to meet U.S. voltage requirements. Certified, safety-tested, and warrantied for use only in the U.S.
SANITIZE WITH STEAM — Steam kills 99.9% of germs and bacteria.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars6,293 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
